data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castro, Diogo, Baptista, Renner, Grismado, Cristian, Ramírez, Martín (2015): New species and records of Otiothopinae from the Southern Atlantic Rainforest, with notes on the claw tufts in Fernandezina Birabén (Araneae: Palpimanidae). Zootaxa 4012 (3): 465-478, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.3.3
